hero.title: We transform opportunities into valuable assets
hero.subtitle: Strategic consulting in technology and investment development. A senior team with a track record of exits and proven execution in Latin America.

strategy.title: Strategy + Execution
strategy.description: We're not a consultancy that delivers PowerPoints. We design the strategy and get involved in execution. Our success is measured in results, not reports.

team.title: Senior Team
team.description: Founders with 15+ years of experience in technology, finance, and business development. Track record includes a €1.5M exit to a European payments processor.

vision.title: LATAM Vision
vision.description: Deep knowledge of Latin American markets. We operate from Argentina with regional reach and global connections.

services.title: Our Services
services.intro: Two business verticals under one vision: identify high-potential opportunities and turn them into reality.

tech.name: Trapial Tech
tech.description: Boutique software factory for companies that need to scale with top-tier technology.
tech.point1: Custom software development: web applications, mobile, APIs, complex integrations.
tech.point2: Artificial Intelligence: process automation, intelligent chatbots, predictive analytics.
tech.point3: Fintech & Payments: processor integrations, payment gateways, compliance.
tech.point4: Tokenization & Blockchain: digital assets, traceability, smart contracts.
tech.point5: Technical consulting: architecture, technology due diligence, product roadmap.
tech.audience: Growing startups that need to scale fast. Established companies looking to make the technology leap.

investments.name: Trapial Investments
investments.description: Structuring and development of investment projects in real assets, focused on Patagonia Argentina.
investments.point1: Real Estate: real estate development in high-potential areas.
investments.point2: Agribusiness: productive projects with a long-term vision.
investments.point3: Deal structuring: analysis, due diligence, investment vehicle setup.
investments.audience: Investors seeking exposure to real assets in Argentina with professional and transparent management.

trackRecord.title: Proven Track Record
trackRecord.description: The founding team built and sold Asamblo, a software factory acquired by a European payments processor handling over €1B monthly. We know how to create value.

senior.title: 100% Senior
senior.description: We don't outsource to juniors. Every project is handled directly by founders and partners with over a decade of experience in their fields.

boutique.title: Boutique
boutique.description: We work with few clients at a time. This allows us to get deeply involved in each project and guarantee results.

skinInTheGame.title: Skin in the Game
skinInTheGame.description: We don't just charge by the hour. We're willing to structure agreements where our success depends on yours.

footerCta.title: Have a project in mind?
footerCta.description: Whether you need to scale your technology or explore an investment opportunity, we want to hear from you.

form.title: Request Access to Opportunities
form.subtitle: Complete this form to begin the validation process

intro.title: A team that builds, not just advises
intro.description: Trapial Group is born from the experience of professionals who have been on the other side of the table: founding companies, closing deals, writing code, and taking real risks. That experience is what we bring to every project.

history.title: Our History
history.paragraph1: The founding team of Trapial has roots in Asamblo, a fintech-specialized software factory that was acquired by a European payments processor that today handles over €1 billion monthly.
history.paragraph2: That experience taught us what works and what doesn't when building high-impact technology products. It also showed us the value of combining technical vision with deep business understanding.
history.paragraph3: Today, under Trapial Group, we apply those lessons on two fronts: technology and investment development. Two distinct verticals, united by the same philosophy: identify real opportunities and execute with excellence.

luciano.description: Software engineer with over 15 years of experience in architecture and development of highly complex systems. Led Asamblo's technical team from its founding to its acquisition.
luciano.specialties: Backend development, distributed systems architecture, fintech integrations, technical team leadership.

nicolas.description: Senior software architect with extensive experience in designing scalable and mission-critical solutions. Part of Asamblo's founding technical team.
nicolas.specialties: Software architecture, API design, high-availability systems, legacy systems modernization.

juanpablo.description: Executive with over 15 years in technology, fintech, and business development in Latin America and US. Former CCO of Asamblo, with experience at PayRetailers, 451°, and other companies in the regional payments ecosystem.
juanpablo.specialties: Business development, program management, commercial strategy, digital payments, LATAM markets.

execution.title: Execution over theory
execution.description: We prefer doing over talking. Every project has concrete and measurable deliverables.

transparency.title: Radical transparency
transparency.description: We say what we think, even when it's not what the client wants to hear. It's the only way to build trust.

longTerm.title: Long term
longTerm.description: We don't look for one-time projects. We build relationships that last years.

quality.title: Quality without compromise
quality.description: We prefer to say no to a project rather than deliver something we're not proud of.

cta.title: Want to know us better?
cta.description: Schedule a call with no commitment. Tell us about your project and let's see if we can help.

hero.title: Build technology that scales
hero.subtitle: From custom development to AI integration. A senior team with 15+ years building mission-critical systems for fintech, payments, and high-growth companies.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: End-to-end technology solutions built by senior engineers who understand business outcomes.

customDev.title: Custom Software Development
customDev.description: Bespoke web and mobile applications built for scale, security, and performance.
customDev.point1: Full-stack web applications with React, Node.js, and cloud-native architecture
customDev.point2: Native and cross-platform mobile apps for iOS and Android
customDev.point3: Complex API integrations and microservices architecture

ai.title: Artificial Intelligence
ai.description: Practical AI solutions that automate processes and unlock insights from your data.
ai.point1: Intelligent chatbots and conversational AI for customer service
ai.point2: Process automation with machine learning models
ai.point3: Predictive analytics and business intelligence dashboards

fintech.title: Fintech & Payments
fintech.description: Deep expertise in payments infrastructure built from our experience scaling Asamblo.
fintech.point1: Payment processor integrations (Stripe, Adyen, local processors)
fintech.point3: PCI compliance, KYC/AML, and regulatory requirements

blockchain.title: Tokenization & Blockchain
blockchain.description: Real-world asset tokenization and blockchain solutions for modern businesses.
blockchain.point1: Security token offerings and digital asset platforms
blockchain.point3: Supply chain traceability and proof of provenance

consulting.title: Technical Consulting
consulting.description: Strategic guidance for technology decisions that impact your business trajectory.
consulting.point2: Technology due diligence for M&A and investments

integration.title: System Integration
integration.description: Connect your systems, data, and workflows for seamless operations.
integration.point1: Enterprise system integration (ERP, CRM, legacy systems)
integration.point3: Real-time event streaming and message queues

expertise.title: Technical Leadership
expertise.subtitle: Every project is led directly by our founding team—senior engineers with proven track records.

luciano.name: Luciano Mazzola
luciano.focus: Backend architecture, distributed systems, fintech integrations

nicolas.name: Nicolás Sosa

caseStudies.title: Proven Results
caseStudies.subtitle: Real outcomes from projects we've delivered for clients across industries.

asamblo.title: Asamblo Payment Platform
asamblo.description: Built the core payment processing infrastructure that was acquired by a European processor handling €1B+ monthly.

fintech.title: Multi-Country Payment Gateway
fintech.description: Developed a payment gateway supporting 6 Latin American countries with real-time currency conversion and local payment methods.

automation.title: Intelligent Document Processing
automation.description: AI-powered system that automated 80% of manual document review for a financial services company.

cta.title: Ready to build something great?
cta.description: Tell us about your project and let's explore how we can help you achieve your technology goals.

hero.title: Real assets, real returns
hero.subtitle: Investment structuring and development in Argentina's most promising regions. Professional management with transparent, long-term partnerships.

opportunity.title: The Opportunity
opportunity.description: Argentina offers unique value propositions for patient capital: world-class natural resources, undervalued real estate in high-growth regions, and a sophisticated professional class. Patagonia, in particular, represents an emerging frontier for sustainable development and premium tourism.

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.description: We identify, structure, and manage investment opportunities with a hands-on approach. Our team brings operational expertise, local networks, and a commitment to transparency that aligns our success with yours.

services.title: Investment Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive support for investors seeking exposure to real assets in Argentina.

realEstate.title: Real Estate Development
realEstate.description: Strategic real estate projects in high-potential areas of Patagonia and beyond.
realEstate.point1: Land acquisition and development in emerging tourism corridors
realEstate.point2: Boutique hospitality projects targeting premium segments
realEstate.point3: Residential developments in growing urban centers

agribusiness.title: Agribusiness
agribusiness.description: Productive agricultural projects with long-term value creation focus.
agribusiness.point1: Premium wine and olive oil production in Mendoza
agribusiness.point2: Sustainable cattle and sheep farming operations

dealStructuring.title: Deal Structuring
dealStructuring.description: Professional structuring of investment vehicles tailored to your objectives.

assetManagement.title: Asset Management
assetManagement.description: Ongoing oversight and optimization of your investment portfolio.
assetManagement.point1: Regular performance reporting and financial statements

landDevelopment.title: Land Development
landDevelopment.description: Converting raw land into productive or developed assets.

dueDiligence.title: Due Diligence
dueDiligence.description: Comprehensive analysis before any investment commitment.

expertise.title: Investment Leadership
expertise.subtitle: Led by professionals with deep experience in Latin American markets.

lead.name: Juan Pablo González
lead.description: Over 15 years of experience in business development and deal structuring across Latin America. Previously led commercial operations at Asamblo and held executive roles at leading regional fintech companies.

opportunities.title: Featured Opportunities
opportunities.subtitle: Current and upcoming investment projects we're structuring for qualified investors.

patagonia.title: Patagonia Lake District Development
patagonia.description: Premium lakefront lots in one of Argentina's fastest-growing tourism destinations, with option for turnkey cabin construction.

vineyard.title: Mendoza Boutique Vineyard
vineyard.description: Participating interest in an established boutique winery producing award-winning Malbec for export markets.

agricultural.description: Large-scale sustainable cattle operation on premium grasslands with certified organic and export-ready positioning.
